description:
In this action-packed platformer, the famous detective Sherlock Holmes is in pursuit of his criminal nemesis Professor Moriarty, who has pulled off a spectacular diamond heist together with his accomplices. The wild chase leads through chic and seedy corners of London, the Baskerville manor house in Dartmoor and the catacombs in Paris. At the end, Sherlock faces his final opponent Moriarty at the famous Reichenbach Falls. 

• Discover 5 exciting worlds in a subtle steampunk setting 
• Overcome difficult obstacles 
• Clear the way of comical and creepy enemies 
• More than 60 challenging levels
• Mini-games: Figure out where Moriarty has escaped to
name: Sherlock Holmes – The Hunt for Moriarty
